contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 8, 2011 D West Wales BBA Contest (Third Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Third Section) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-third-section
None
Burry Port, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Jonathan Jones - solo cornet (Seindorf Crwbin). Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £125, 3rd £100. 7 bands competed.
Oct. 9, 2011, 9:46 p.m. July 4, 2020, 11:59 a.m.
1 Crwbin Silver Band Michael Thorne A Malvern Suite
2 TATA Brass Ceri Thomas
3 Abertillery & District Youth Dean Evans
4 Ammanford Silver Band Glyn Davies
5 Ogmore Valley Silver Band Alice Jones
6 Newport Borough Band Ivor Barnett
7 Ystradgynlais Public Band Alex Parker
Withdrawn Goodwick Brass Matthew Jenkins
